title: France panorama. [No. 72/23]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: The student-body - attendance in French schools and universities. Rothko - Rothko exhibition at the Modern Art Museum. 2. Nuclear technology - the cooling system at the Bugey nuclear generating station. 3. Autun, 20 centuries of city planning - problems and projects. 4. Queen Elizabeth in France - the Royal visit.
